normalized: ３ years later――
3 years had passed from the day of the annihilated oboro forbearance army.
i indulged in the memories of the time that had passed.
i withdrew from the adn in the time of the oboro forbearance army battle.

name: asagi
normalized: is that so、already…three years have gone by…
i truly wasn't concerned about retiring from the adn.
no, i perpetrated a taboo and i am no longer allowed to be associated with them.
i did not feel guilty or regret it, because that was my own desire…
i came to the park that flooded with unsuited greenery in the city center.
the park appears to have been created for the sake of afforestation policy of the city center after the economic bubble collapsed.
greenery was destroyed when skyscrapers were starting up to the sky, with the open gap again, greenery was recreated.
somebody's charitable enterprise perhaps, but being anxious to please was strange.
still, it was here in the city's hustle and bustle, and sort of entirely unbelievable.
catching sight of many people dozing off on benches, businessmen came here to relax and refresh themselves.
this too i guess was how human beings lived in the city.

name: asagi
normalized: i wonder if i'm a little early…
sticking out my wristwatch, i confirm the time.
i had a hunch it was surely much too early.
because that person is a tiny bit different and a person who doesn't always show up at a place on time.
i was rendezvousing with a person at the park.
that person is treated as a senior government agent, and also happens to be my teacher and founder of adn.
until the planned time, 5 seconds, 4, 3, 2, 1.
i thought my shadow had distorted momentarily.

name: senior
normalized: ――you never change, do you?
asagi
from the shadow directly in my memory, i telepathically leaped.

name: asagi
normalized: for sure, senior people sort of never change

name: senior
normalized: by no means do i want to take a turn for the worse.
i wanted to talk and meet first hand, maa, but you know how it is….
a government agent, he was the most important person that brought together adn.
it too wasn't unreasonable that people were after him, constantly aware of the danger.

name: asagi
normalized: no, availing myself of your kind offer… is too generous for my sort

name: senior
normalized: so, it seems i can't be formal.
there isn't a bit of time.
shall i sort of summarize?

name: asagi
normalized: yes…

name: senior
normalized: maa, i feel it wasn't wise of you to retire from adn, the adn are being assassinated, one by one.

name: asagi
normalized: eh!?
the adn are being assassinated？
i, for a moment, was suspcious of what i heard.

name: senior
normalized: 9 people have been killed within several months here.

name: asagi
normalized: 9 people!?
2 in 20 years, and only 3 people have lost their lives in combat, the adn lost this many in several months….
i couldn't believe this!
for generations, it's been an inheritance, there isn't anyone left for the adn to feud with.
the matter of being endowed by birth, wasn't only practiced in tradition.
so, the adn's strength and influence comes from the their ability to include it in their genetics.
that sort of rare body and hand-to-hand fighting technique, makes fencing an attribute that even the best ordinary man can't match.
that…9 of them died in merely a few months.
the senior immediately astonished me returning his words.
although his figure could not be seen, that silence meant it was a matter of importance, and i was able to infer in full the government's situation.

name: senior
normalized: this arrangement is aimed at adn, they are being hunted, one by one, and….
killed.
i saw too the cold-blooded acts that were carried out on the bodies.
cold-bloodedness, this word meant an answer from the elder's mouth, it seems this person had killed a great many.
it appeared a person was carrying out bizarre murders in some kind of childish game.

name: senior
normalized: to kill adn members, they must be a considerable fencing master…nevertheless….

name: asagi
normalized: killing in cold-bloodedness
again, the elder was silent.

name: senior
normalized: how about it, asagi.
will you not return?
i want you to settle this matter

name: asagi
normalized: i have violated a female ninja taboo, i defied the senior's teachings.
i no longer qualify as an adn member

name: senior
normalized: is that so….
is your decision that solid?

name: asagi
normalized: it is inexcusable
i lowered my head with silence, with no-one being in my vicinity.

name: senior
normalized: it's ok, it's ok, don't apologize.
because, again, you are not my subordinate person, nevertheless…

name: asagi
normalized: what can i do？

name: senior
normalized: it cannot be helped that spy's blood runs in you.
you don't desire ordinary people's lives and the like… certainly that fate assails you
so, perhaps it appeared i thought in that instant at the eldest's words.
however, the fact is, i casted it aside.

name: asagi
normalized: with the exception of me, isn't there a suitable person for this task.
i already have no connection to this conversation…
abandoning the fate of playing a role in the adn, i once more played hard to get.

name: senior
normalized: is this about the incident that occurred with the oboro forbearance army?

name: asagi
normalized: …eh！？

name: senior
normalized: by no means was the ofa concluded, their people are killing adn now, that's to say ninja; i observed their methods, i have no doubt

name: asagi
normalized: that….
can't be
i questioned the senior's words, fixing my eyes on my hand, pressing the question personally.
…it cannot be true that that has occurred.
i did not make a mistake; with this hand, oboro's head, and the ofa…

name: senior
normalized: the ofa are again cooperating with the nomads, if i remember correctly, the information i received stated that they were resuming maneuvering in tokyo.
nomads…of course, it's useless to only cut the tail off lizard in the ofa.
the nomads conspired with the evil spirits of the rivers and mountains, forming a multinational conglomerate body.
the nomads are using the ofa to amass in tokyo, advancing a foothold in japan, which will transform, in a single breath, the city into a demon capital.
to begin with, the nomads operate in a borderless society, the good rumors in that organization, are the bad rumors that never die out.
the nomad originator, edwyn black, rumor has that he's a resident of the dark, a vampire.
the ofa, is oboro still alive….
hadn't i dealt the final blow with my ninjitsu?
hadn't i decapitated and ended her life with my own blade?
such circumstances absolutely cannot exist.

name: asagi
normalized: these circumstances cannot exist, oboro… that woman, i surely consigned her to oblivion
while ruminating on the sensation of beheading her, i mightily asserted myself.

name: senior
normalized: yea…but perhaps by some chance, a survivor borrowed the nomad's support, and recreated the ofa a second time.
ordinarily, that thought should've came to mind in the beginning.

name: senior
normalized: but, even if they borrowed support from the nomads, they would be like refugees, i think 3 years is much too short of a time to rebuild the ofa.
certainly….
coming across the head of a former sympathizer of the koka ninja, for sure oboro's existence and the ofa were truly miraculous.
and lately considering that a ninja of the highest class is concerned with assasinating the adn.
with the remnants support, oboro personally reformed the ofa again to present a threat to the government, from top to bottom.
however, that still doesn't explain oboro being decapitated by my own hand.
there's no reason for her to still be alive.

name: senior
normalized: if we assume oboro is still alive, you are her only match
assuming oboro is still alive…
i feel that that sort of thing cannot be possible.

name: asagi
normalized: …please let me think about it
i said to the senior, before leaving the park behind.
